Chinese.name: MapReduce示例函数
Chinese.description: 本示例Demo演示怎么利用COS来做MapReduce，一共需要2个函数：map_function和reduce_function，3个COS Bucket：srcmr、middlestagebucket 和 destmr。
Chinese.attention: 具体使用方法步骤说明，可参考产品文档的最佳实践：https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/583/9728

English.name: MapFunction
English.description: This is one of the MapReduce function which is map_function.
